row.process: :PRINT "[START JOBI.SQL_BBS_PARAM]===============================" ! ------------------------------------------------ ! DB-Parameter aus Ebenen-Informationen ermitteln: ! -------------+--------+---------------------+-------+ ! EBENE(&IDT#) | DB | SERVER | CLIENT | ! -------------+--------+---------------------+--------+ ! E | DLLW1E | dllw1e.ora | 90 | ! I | DLLW1I | dllw1i.ora | 100 | ! W | DLLW1W | dllw1w.ora | 110 | ! P | DLLW1P | dllw1p.ora | 100 | ! -------------+--------+---------------------+--------+ ! Datenbank-Ebene festlegen: ! -------------------------- :SET &EBENE# = GET_VAR("VARA.CONFIG_EBENE", "EBENE") :SET &IDT# = STR_CUT(&EBENE#, 1, 1) :PSET &DB_UC# = "DLLW1&IDT#" ! ---------------------------- ! Fuer den Server alles klein: ! ---------------------------- :PSET &DB_LC# = STR_LC(&DB_UC#) :PSET &DB_SERVER# = "&DB_LC#.ora.a1-core.athora.net:1521" ! --------------- ! Welcher Client? ! --------------- :SET &CLIENT# = SYS_ACT_CLIENT() :SET &CLIENT# = FORMAT("&CLIENT#","000") :PSET &DB_CLIENT# = "&CLIENT#" ! -------------------------------- :PUT_ATT SERVER_NAME = "&DB_SERVER#" :PUT_ATT DATABASE_NAME = "&DB_UC#" ! -------------------------------- :PRINT "" :PRINT ">>> PARAMETER:" :PRINT " -> SERVER_NAME = &DB_SERVER#" :PRINT " -> DATABASE_NAME = &DB_UC#" :PRINT "" :PRINT "================================[ENDE JOBI.SQL_BBS_PARAM]"
